channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I don’t own a house’: I’m 50 with $2 million and I’m scared about losing my job. Can I retire early?
item.description: “My monthly expenses are around $6,000. That includes rent.”

item.title: Here’s what’s worth streaming in February 2026 on Netflix, Hulu, Peacock and more
item.description: With a few notable exceptions, the Winter Olympics is putting a chill on new streaming releases

item.title: Gold’s searing run halted, silver briefly drops below $100 as Warsh nomination to Fed hits dollar debasement trade
item.description: A selloff is underway for gold, silver and copper on Friday, as the dollar rises on expectations that Kevin Warsh will be the next Federal Reserve cha...

item.title: ‘I‘m facing an ethical dilemma’: My widowed mother is cutting my step siblings out of the family trust. Do I have a responsibility?
item.description: “My mother has now hired an attorney to revise the trust and remove her late husband’s children as beneficiaries.”

item.title: I’m afraid a bridesmaid will drop out of a bachelorette party and leave us on the hook. How can I avoid this?
item.description: “She has a history of not respecting other people’s time or money.”

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
